so_66860657: declare -a arr=([0]="name: foo-bar#2.3.2" [1]="name: bar-foo-4.2" [2]="name: foobar" [3]="name: far-far")
fileRegex='name: ([[:alpha:]]+(-[[:alpha:]]+)*)'
for s in "${arr[@]}"; do
   [[ $s =~ $fileRegex ]] && echo "${BASH_REMATCH[1]}"
done
su_169858: age () { stat=$(stat --printf="%Y %F\n" "$1"); echo "The ${stat#* } '$1' is $((($(date +%s) - ${stat%% *})/86400)) days old."; }
